thread.title: You Can Customize the Nike VaporMax on Air Max Day, March 26
thread.title_full: You Can Customize the Nike VaporMax on Air Max Day, March 26

author: Chris Danforth
title: You Can Customize the Nike VaporMax on Air Max Day, March 26
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
More big news from Nike regarding Air Max Day 2017.
For one day only, NIKEiD will be allowing customization of both the Flyknit Air Max 1 Ultra and the Nike Air VaporMax (which launches at retail and NIKEiD on Air Max Day, March 26). Both options pay homage to the OG red colorway and Nike’s signature Volt, while multicolor Flyknit uppers are also options for either silhouette.
You can also deck out your new shoes with AIRMOJIs, a collection of graphic designs and slogans that call back to Nike’s history of Air.
Don’t sleep, as availability is limited to one day only on March 26 at nike.com and Nike events across the globe.
While you’re waiting, shop more of our favorite releases on Highsnobiety ‘s curated shopping channel What Drops Now .
